text: وَهُمْ يَنْهَوْنَ عَنْهُ وَيَنْـَٔوْنَ عَنْهُ ۖ وَإِن يُهْلِكُونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And they prevent [others] from him and are [themselves] remote from him. And they do not destroy except themselves, but they perceive [it] not.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan mereka melarang (orang lain) mendengarkan Al-Quran dan mereka sendiri menjauhkan diri daripadanya, dan mereka hanyalah membinasakan diri mereka sendiri, sedang mereka tidak menyadari.
